Text: FW HOT OFF THE PRESS Information Management Awardsof our latest award highly personalised portal for Yellow Pages combining many different data sources and demonstrating real benefits in collaboration knowledge decision support and content management regards Mike Altendorf Original Message From AlQasem Iyas Sent November To Europe Staff NY CT Staff Texas Staff Subject HOT OFF THE PRESS Information Management Awards At the Information Management Awards held last night in London Conchango and Yellow Pages won The Premier Project Award one of the Blue Riband awards of the night This was the most hotly contested award forcing Andersen Consultings project with Shell into the runner up position It culminated a successful evening where our Yell Insight project came Runner up in the Data Warehousing Project category and Third in the Knowledge Management category Congratulations are due to most of the Conchango IIS team who at one time or another worked on this project However special congratulations to Steve Lally who has been project managing this and other Yellow Pages projects for months and aside from delivering quality and managing Conchango and Yellow Pages staff has grown Yellow Pages into IISs largest account Thanks also to Jo Hudgell for her efforts in preparing the submission Spread the news far and wide Iyas AlQasem Conchango Experienced in business Experts at technology T F M E The information contained in this message is confidential and is intended for the addressee only If you have received this message in error please notify us as soon as possible The unauthorised use disclosure copying or alteration of this message is forbidden
